explanation: in this post, i'm emphasizing the importance of data privacy and the responsibility that comes with it. i'm using the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) to reach a wider audience and make my post more discoverable. by using the phrase "datenschutz ist nicht nur ein recht, es ist eine pflicht" (data privacy is not just a right, it's a duty), i'm expressing that protecting personal information is not only a fundamental right but also an obligation for individuals to take action and ensure their data remains secure.
